A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: While some questions that Force Awakens posed were answered weakly and without much ado\, I feel that certain aspects were deeply satisfying and have propelled the story forward. The chemistry between the characters is phenomenal and the acting was superb. I enjoyed it and will watch it over and over again despite some lackluster writing offered up by Rian Johnson (thank God J.J. is writing and directing episode IX).
